lyric:
[by:爻酥]
[ti: Someone You Love]
[ar: Lewis Capaldi]
[al: Romantic Pop Songs]
[tool: 歌词滚动姬 https://lrc-maker.github.io]
[length: 03:04.059]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Lewis Capaldi/Sam Roman/Benjamin Kohn/Pete Kelleher/Tom Barnes
[00:01.000] 作词 : Lewis Capaldi/Sam Roman/Benjamin Kohn/Pete Kelleher/Tom Barnes
[00:09.091] I'm going under and this time I fear there's no one to save me
[00:17.857] This all or nothing really got a way of driving me crazy
[00:24.342] I need somebody to heal
[00:27.013] Somebody to know
[00:29.256] Somebody to have
[00:31.346] Somebody to hold
[00:33.577] It's easy to say
[00:35.739] But it's never the same
[00:37.947] I guess I kinda liked the way you numbed all the pain
[00:42.155] Now the day bleeds
[00:44.208] Into nightfall
[00:46.481] And you're not here
[00:48.285] To get me through it all
[00:50.561] I let my guard down
[00:52.747] And then you pulled the rug
[00:55.183] I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved
[01:01.394] I'm going under and this time I fear there's no one to turn to
[01:10.142] This all or nothing way of loving got me sleeping without you
[01:16.634] Now I need somebody to know
[01:19.401] Somebody to heal
[01:21.592] Somebody to have
[01:23.590] Just to know how it feels
[01:25.891] It's easy to say
[01:28.050] But it's never the same
[01:30.239] I guess I kinda liked the way you helped me escape
[01:34.467] Now the day bleeds
[01:36.636] Into nightfall
[01:38.796] And you're not here
[01:40.675] To get me through it all
[01:42.924] I let my guard down
[01:45.126] And then you pulled the rug
[01:47.505] I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved
[01:53.297] And I tend to close my eyes when it hurts sometimes
[01:59.392] I fall into your arms
[02:03.791] I'll be safe in your sound til I come back around
[02:09.035] For now the day bleeds
[02:11.508] Into nightfall
[02:13.679] And you're not here
[02:15.435] To get me through it all
[02:17.922] I let my guard down
[02:20.043] And then you pulled the rug
[02:22.480] I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved
[02:26.474] But now the day bleeds
[02:28.875] Into nightfall
[02:31.181] And you're not here
[02:33.037] To get me through it all
[02:35.179] I let my guard down
[02:37.412] And then you pulled the rug
[02:39.925] I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved
[02:43.966] I let my guard down
[02:46.265] And then you pulled the rug
[02:48.659] I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved
tlyric:
[by:Melponome]
[00:09.091]我将要沉沦，但恐怕这次没人能够伸出援手
[00:17.857]这里的一切都逼得我快疯掉
[00:24.342]我需要一个治愈我的爱人
[00:27.013]一个可以披心相付
[00:29.256]可以真正拥有
[00:31.346]可以温暖相拥的爱人
[00:33.577]说说总是很容易
[00:35.739]却永远无法如愿
[00:37.947]我想我已有点喜欢你麻木自己的方式了
[00:42.155]现在晚霞如血
[00:44.208]夜幕降临
[00:46.481]但是你却不在我身边
[00:48.285]陪我度过难关
[00:50.561]我放下了所有戒备
[00:52.747]你却无情将我击溃
[00:55.183]我已习惯了做你爱的人
[01:01.394]我将要沉沦，但恐怕这次无人可以求助
[01:10.142]没有你，这一切使我夜夜难寐
[01:16.634]如今我需要一个与我白首相知的爱人
[01:19.401]一个可以治愈我
[01:21.592]可以真正拥有的爱人
[01:23.590]只是想尝尝爱情的滋味
[01:25.891]说起来总是容易
[01:28.050]却永远无法如愿
[01:30.239]我想我喜欢你帮我逃离困境的方式
[01:34.467]现在晚霞如血
[01:36.636]夜幕降临
[01:38.796]但是你却不在我身边
[01:40.675]陪我度过难关
[01:42.924]我放下了所有戒备
[01:45.126]你却无情将我击溃
[01:47.505]我已习惯了做你爱的人
[01:53.297]心痛之时往往会闭上双眼
[01:59.392]当我回家时，倒入你的怀抱
[02:03.791]在你轻柔的絮语中我将无比安心
[02:09.035]现在晚霞如血
[02:11.508]夜幕降临
[02:13.679]但是你却不在我身边
[02:15.435]陪我度过难关
[02:17.922]我放下了所有戒备
[02:20.043]你却无情将我击溃
[02:22.480]我已习惯了做你爱的人

[02:33.037]陪我度过难关

[02:37.412]你却无情将我击溃
[02:39.925]我已习惯了做你爱的人
